text: Matruza Hossain Mollah is a Bangladesh Nationalist Party politician and the former Member of Parliament of Comilla-7. ==Career== Mollah was elected to parliament from Comilla-7 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate in 1979. ==Death== Mollah died on 16 September 2017. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:2017 deaths Category:2nd Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Matruza Hossain Mollah
